text:
<@UDHT6N5SM> how do you want to use HubSpot as a headless CMS? Do you want to use structured data (HubDB tables, CRM objects) as headless data, or unstructured data (regular drag and drop pages) as headless data?

Also, how do you want to use the data in an external presentation layer? Do you have a build stage in a JAMstack style style site, or do you want to hit an API from the FE of the presentation layer?
And if anyone wants to talk more headless, please book me <https://app.HubSpot.com/meetings/wspiro|here>! Would love to chat more about expectations as this is something we are thinking about

<@U6W3H6YN8> I'm going to think about it and put together a better reply. Before I really thought about it, my goal was to code an entire site using SvelteKit but have the entire editing process (including drag and drop) available in the same way that it is now in HubSpot.
Just an FYI we have passed this feedback internally to teams :smile:
